Huge thanks to my friend who recommended this place to me a while back.  And I'm so glad I thought of going here on this night.  This was a strange experience, but good nonetheless.  My friend & I were starved, and wanted something nice for his last night in Barcelona.  Though we didn't have reservations, and the place was packed, the staff made accommodations for us - we could stay from 9:30 to 10:15 because they needed that table for a reservation arriving at 10:15. We were thankful that they made room for us.  Although we didn't get to try too many things, we did get a couple of some of their best dishes, and shared a bottle of wine.  The egg carpaccio was phenomenal (I love egg... you can never go wrong by serving me egg), and a fish tempura dish - I don't remember the fish.  Both were cooked to perfection, the wine was divine... our only regret was that we couldn't stay longer, try more food, and cap it off with dessert.  I will definitely return (special occasion, of course, as it's not cheap - but also - it's not *that* expensive).  The decor was wonderful, too.  A great use of space in such a tiny location.
